title: Cant Get Into The Client
body:
So riot insists that we now make a riot account, which is fair and I would be cool with it IF it wasn't already bugged. I click on the link and go to the page where it says it sent a password to my email then the next page where I enter the password and I think all is well and good and then in typical riot fashion they return me to the same page sending me in a never ending loop. and once again I wouldn't of minded to horribly because all I wanted to do was play league but then of course it wont let you until you have made an account. Im just gonna go play Warframe. 


Update 1. it was fixed and now today its back and I cant get in. at least fix it before you release it riot.

replies.body:
yeah, same, what should I do?????  
Anyone can help?
same to me , what just happen ?
I'm caught in the same loop.
This is happening to me aswell. it doesn't change anything as its still an account with riot. why is this such a bloody mess. need this fixed asap
Try now, the pop up is gone for me on one of my acc
